Table D-2 Differences between Flexible Capacity and CBU IBM Z Flexible Capacity for Cyber Resiliency Capacity Back Up Primary purpose and benefits All CBU benefits at an alternative site, plus:  Run mainframe workload in alternative site for up to 1 year  Demonstrate ability to migrate entire mainframe workload to alternative site (for example, regulatory requirements)  Run entire workload in alternative site for extended period (for example, facilities requirements)  Proactively swap production to alternative out-of-region site before a (natural) disaster occurs Run full mainframe workload if DR event is declared:  Ability to test DR readiness up to 10 days.  Validate with nonproduction workload (up to 10 days per CBU test).  Validate with production workload (up to 10 days per CBU test).
